mapper.select: select * from project where PSTATUSCODE =1 and pid in (select pid from pmember where mid=#{mid}) ORDER BY pid desc
select c.tid from comments c join task t on c.tid = t.tid where t.pid = #{pid} and (cmtkind = 1 or cmtkind=2) ORDER BY c.CMTMTIME DESC

select c.*, m.mname,t.tname,p.pname from comments c join member m on c.mid = m.mid join task t on t.tid = c.tid join project p on p.pid = t.pid where c.tid in (select tid from task where pid = #{pid}) and (cmtkind = 1 or cmtkind=2) ORDER BY decode(c.TID,#{newtid},c.TID),c.TID DESC,c.CMTMTIME DESC
